org.easybatch.extensions.quartz

Class JobScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easybatch.extensions.quartz.JobScheduler

  • public class JobScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    Quartz scheduler wrapper used to setup triggers.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Get the scheduler instance.

      Check if the scheduler is stopped.

      Schedule a job to start at a fixed point of time.
      void scheduleAtWithInterval(Job job, java.util.Date startTime, int interval)
      Schedule a job to start at a fixed point of time and repeat with interval period.

      Schedule a job with a unix-like cron expression.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static JobScheduler getInstance()
                                throws JobSchedulerException
        Get the scheduler instance.
        Returns:
        The scheduler instance
        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException - thrown if an exception occurs while creating the scheduler

      • scheduleAt

        public void scheduleAt(Job job,
              java.util.Date startTime)
                throws JobSchedulerException
        Schedule a job to start at a fixed point of time.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to schedule
        startTime - the start time
        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException

      • scheduleAtWithInterval

        public void scheduleAtWithInterval(Job job,
                          java.util.Date startTime,
                          int interval)
                            throws JobSchedulerException
        Schedule a job to start at a fixed point of time and repeat with interval period.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to schedule
        startTime - the start time
        interval - the repeat interval in seconds
        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException

      • scheduleCron

        public void scheduleCron(Job job,
                java.lang.String cronExpression)
                  throws JobSchedulerException
        Schedule a job with a unix-like cron expression.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to schedule
        cronExpression - the cron expression to use. For a complete tutorial about cron expressions, please refer to quartz reference documentation.
        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException

      • unschedule

        public void unschedule(Job job)
                throws JobSchedulerException
        Unschedule the given job.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to unschedule
        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException - thrown if an exception occurs during job unscheduling

      • isScheduled

        public boolean isScheduled(Job job)
                    throws JobSchedulerException
        Check if the given job is scheduled.
        Parameters:
        job - the job to check
        Returns:
        true if the job is scheduled, false else
        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException - thrown if an exception occurs while checking if the job is scheduled

      • start

        public void start()
           throws JobSchedulerException
        Start the scheduler.
        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException - thrown if the scheduler cannot be started

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws JobSchedulerException
        Stop the scheduler.

        Note: The scheduler cannot be re-started and no more jobs can be scheduled.

        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException - thrown if the scheduler cannot be stopped

      • isStarted

        public boolean isStarted()
                  throws JobSchedulerException
        Check if the scheduler is started.
        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException - thrown if the scheduler status cannot be checked

      • isStopped

        public boolean isStopped()
                  throws JobSchedulerException
        Check if the scheduler is stopped.
        Throws:
        JobSchedulerException - thrown if the scheduler status cannot be checked
